Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: People are worried about the upcoming budget and the test will be whether it delivers on promises made by the opposition party. Meanwhile questions surround the PM's judgment as he attends a friend's wedding during one of the most crucial periods in his career. In contrast the government's energy plan is praised for shielding households and businesses from rising energy prices. Conversely the impact of Stage 3 tax cuts that primarily benefit high-income earners is coming under scrutiny as the revenue lost could provide three rounds of JobSeeker rate increases that could benefit low-income women. Lastly the government has extended the deadline for Homebuilder applicants while aiding a stadium upgrade to create local jobs in Launceston highlighting their commitment to building an economy that serves all Australians.
